waifu.title: Waifu Pics
waifu.description: **Get a random image of the waifu of your choice, or a random one.**

gif.title: Reaction Gifs
gif.description:
**gif_name [@someone/ID] (optional)**
 Posts a gif of the requested action (with or without an @)

image_manipulation.title: Image Filters/Warping
image_manipulation.description:
**method [attachment/emote/link/^(last image)/avatar]**
 Posts a modified image based on source
